DataElement.preferredName: Tooth Extraction Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Performed Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no/unknown indicator related to pulling-out of tooth prior to self-reported area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tooth Extraction Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to pulling-out of tooth prior to self-reported area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.:The act of pulling out, including the process of obtaining something from a mixture or compound by chemical or physical or mechanical means.

Concepts.definition: The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.
The act of pulling out, including the process of obtaining something from a mixture or compound by chemical or physical or mechanical means.

An area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.
Executed and carried through to completion.
